entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being weak and exhausted after the protection spell was cast.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as being anxious about Dumbledore's condition and tries to help him walk back around the lake.

entities.name: inferi
entities.description: Undead creatures that were summoned by Voldemort but did not emerge from the water again after the protection spell was cast.

relationships.description: Harry tries to help Dumbledore walk back around the lake, bearing most of his weight and guiding him with his arm.
